inscription: punch, UR center and corner of body
markings: two marks: left one is square (Head with mowhawk); right is diamond shaped (initials \'E.P.\'); stamped with poincon du Maitre orfevre
object_name: Creamer, from a five-piece coffee and tea service
title: Creamer, from a five-piece coffee and tea service
